---
title: "plot_diamonds"
output: html_document
date: "2024-08-12"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
datetime_label <- glue::glue("{lubridate::date(Sys.time())} {lubridate::minute(Sys.time())}:{lubridate::hour(Sys.time())}")

ggplot2::diamonds |> 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(aes(x = carat, y = price, group = color, color = color)) + 
  geom_text(aes(x = 4, y = 0), label = datetime_label)

```
